EmailTemplate.name: SpringOne 2GX 2015.Marriott Marquis $299/per night rate goes up after 8/24
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne 2GX Special Rate at the Marriott Marquis Ends on Monday, August 24th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Marriott Marquis $229 per night rate Expires on Monday, 8/24
BOOK IT NOW! <https://resweb.passkey.com/go/2015SpringOne2GX>
Don't miss this special rate of $229 per night at the Washington Marriott Marquis and book your room by Monday, August 24th. Rooms are filling up fast and we want to make sure you lock in this preferred SpringOne 2GX rate before it's too late. Book Now <https://resweb.passkey.com/go/2015SpringOne2GX>!
Marriott Marquis Hotel 901 Massachusetts Avenue NW Washington, District Of Columbia 20001 USA [map <https://www.google.com/maps/place/Marriott+Marquis+Washington,+Washington,+DC+20001/@38.9036283,-77.0247219,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89b7b792e03c44d1:0xbbfcef3a3f4dfa2>] (202) 824-9200
See you there, The Spring Team at Pivotal <http://www.pivotal.io>
